item2: During three months ended September 30, 2025, change revenue Same Store segment primarily driven average effective rent per unit. average effective rent per unit Same Store segment decreased $1,693 three months ended September 30, 2025 compared $1,700 three months ended September 30, 2024, 0.4% decrease three months ended September 30, 2025 compared three months ended September 30, 2024. Average effective rent per unit represents average gross rent amounts, after effect leasing concessions, occupied apartment units plus prevalent market rates asked unoccupied apartment units, divided total number units. Leasing concessions represent discounts current market rate.
